column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shut down at Old Frankfort Pike due to a serious collision between Old Frankfort Pike and Versailles Rd.  A motorcyclist is reportedly involved.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Traffic is being diverted to Old Frankfort Pike.  Expect increased congestion.  Police will be directing traffic on Manchester St and S Forbes Rd.
